mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_common_column (board_idx,subject, content, gender,appoint_place, member_cnt, deadline) VALUES(#{board_idx},#{subject},#{content},#{gender},#{appoint_place},#{member_cnt},#{deadline})
INSERT INTO photo(oriFileName, newFileName, board_idx, category_id) VALUES(#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4})
